Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.helper.models

Class ReqMaster

java.lang.Object
io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.helper.models.ReqMaster
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReqEndpoint, ReqFile
public sealed class ReqMaster extends Object permits ReqEndpoint, ReqFile
Parent model for communicate endpoint data to/from endpoint methods to/from database.
Since:
v1.0.0
